response.msg:
嗯，用户查询的是关于"余承东官宣享界品牌大使"的信息，看起来是想了解这个事件的详细情况。从搜索结果来看，这个话题在微博上讨论很热烈，主要集中在2025年10月30日发布的内容。

用户可能是个科技或汽车爱好者，想了解华为旗下享界品牌的最新动态，或者对杨幂和沈腾这两位代言人感兴趣。考虑到事件刚发生不久，用户可能想获取第一手的官方信息和市场反应。

让我梳理一下核心信息点：
品牌大使方面，余承东确实在10月30日官宣了杨幂和沈腾担任享界品牌大使。有意思的是，杨幂的title从之前的"品牌挚友"升级到了"品牌大使"，说明合作加深了。她同时还担任华为Mate XTs鸿蒙推广大使，是少数横跨华为手机和汽车的双线代言人。

营销创意上，享界S9T的广告主打"旅行车不旅行"的反套路概念，用洗脑的排比句展示多场景适用性，比如"开着去上班行不行"、"去露营行不行"。两位代言人的组合也很有心思：杨幂负责优雅时尚，沈腾负责幽默接地气，这种反差萌挺讨喜。

产品亮点部分，享界S9T作为鸿蒙智行首款旅行车，确实打破常规：既有旅行车的造型，又通过后排一键放倒实现1677L储物空间，号称能装下婴儿车、滑雪板等大件。技术上有华为乾崑智驾ADS 4.0系统，支持车位到车位自动领航，还有让宝妈们心动的压缩机冷暖箱设计。

市场反馈很热烈，上市25天大定就突破2万台，首周销量超过BBA同级车型。这或许能解释为什么用户会关注这个话题——毕竟能在豪华车市场撼动BBA的国产车型不多见。

在组织回答时，我会把品牌信息、产品特性、营销创意和市场表现分成四个板块，每个板块引用3-5条最相关的搜索结果。比如说到场景应用时，重点引用展示具体功能的；提到销量就引用含具体数据的。对于代言人升级这类行业细节，会标注这类信源。

最后要特别注意，虽然很多账号带"优质搜索结果"标签，但像这种纯玩梗的内容就不引用了，确保信息的有效性。用户如果后续想了解具体车型配置或预订权益，可以再补充里的细节。


余承东于10月30日正式官宣杨幂和沈腾担任享界品牌大使，两人通过创意视频共同演绎享界S9T的全场景用车理念，引发广泛关注。以下是事件的深度解析：
### **一、品牌大使与代言策略**
1. **明星组合亮点**
杨幂与沈腾形成“优雅灵动+幽默亲和”的双重风格：```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 4, "data": {"num": [1, 3], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "明星特别任务", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227387245562499", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "娱乐有饭", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227387962001921", "index": 3, "label": ""}]}}```
- **杨幂**：从享界S9品牌挚友升级为享界品牌大使，并同时担任华为Mate XTs鸿蒙推广大使，成为横跨华为手机与汽车的双线代言人。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 5, "data": {"num": [7, 12], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "佩佩晴天的blog", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227403219568750", "index": 7, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "copy姨娘专属", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227474583815067", "index": 12, "label": ""}], "name": "佩佩晴天的blog", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/84086b80ly8i5c71fq70hj20u00u0gph.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761907027&ssig=MN80NO3h%2F5", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227403219568750", "vType": 0}}```
- **沈腾**：国民级喜剧形象强化品牌接地气特质，其“旅行车不旅行行不行”的诘问成为核心传播梗。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 6, "data": {"num": [2, 5], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "猛犸新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227374661601122", "index": 5, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "新渠道李霸天", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227425681641698", "index": 2, "label": ""}], "name": "猛犸新闻", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/001PbIJXly8h8vgm016gwj60go0go3z602.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761907027&ssig=N1cRGZPNiT", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227374661601122", "vType": 3}}```

2. **营销创新**
广告以生活场景打破旅行车传统定位，通过“行不行”排比句覆盖上班、带娃、露营、滑雪等多元需求，传递“一车全能”理念。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 7, "data": {"num": [2, 15], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "小橙评测", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227424908576433", "index": 15, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "新渠道李霸天", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227425681641698", "index": 2, "label": ""}], "name": "小橙评测", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.694.694.50/a952b062ly8h8wp42iugqj20ja0ja75b.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761907027&ssig=FrWCKsm1G4", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227424908576433", "vType": 0}}```
明星特别任务
猛犸新闻
copy姨娘专属
娱乐有饭

### **二、享界S9T产品力解析**
1. **场景革命**
- **空间设计**：后排一键放倒拓展1677L储物空间（媲美SUV），支持婴儿车、滑雪板等大型装备。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 11, "data": {"num": [4, 18], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "布朗倪Suki", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227386918667232", "index": 4, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "好多车ANYCAR", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227387001766212", "index": 18, "label": ""}], "name": "布朗倪Suki", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.512.512.50/7e60c423ly8i0syoarbixj20e80e83z9.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761907027&ssig=OqHiamxonZ", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227386918667232", "vType": 0}}```
- **全场景适配**：
- 城市通勤：华为乾崑智驾ADS 4.0实现车位到车位自动领航，拥堵路段自动跟车。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 13, "data": {"num": [23, 27], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "科技宅麦迪", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227424356238550", "index": 23, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "代号腿妹", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227418081037460", "index": 27, "label": ""}], "name": "科技宅麦迪", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/006W3hVqly8hyvokrzd04j30u00u0mz3.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761907027&ssig=Q%2BF0liTH1G", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227424356238550", "vType": 0}}```
- 户外场景：6000W外放电支持火锅、咖啡机等设备，车顶行李架承重50kg。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 14, "data": {"num": [15, 25], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "有故事的皮同学", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227423538354146", "index": 25, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "小橙评测", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227424908576433", "index": 15, "label": ""}], "name": "有故事的皮同学", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/e8410160ly8hrlackw481j20u00u0q3p.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761907027&ssig=3Vb%2B4jUbMA", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227423538354146", "vType": 0}}```
- 家庭需求：副驾零重力座椅+压缩机冷暖箱（-6°C至50°C），满足母婴温奶需求。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 15, "data": {"num": [6, 34], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "高嘉龙Dragon", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227425860423101", "index": 6, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "宋素雯", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227419779995192", "index": 34, "label": ""}], "name": "高嘉龙Dragon", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/93944535ly8hyvopoj36yj20u00u0jui.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761907027&ssig=FqhT%2FauPqW", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227425860423101", "vType": 0}}```

2. **核心技术**
- **智驾系统**：标配36个高精度传感器（含4激光雷达），支持全国点到点领航。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 17, "data": {"num": [13, 29], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "水雾同学_DrEV", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227426792869959", "index": 13, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "丁丁科技说", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227427940796059", "index": 29, "label": ""}], "name": "水雾同学_DrEV", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1023.1023.50/c183613bly8hxtd0c3lbdj20sg0sfdhe.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761907027&ssig=Ro7DlUjw6K", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227426792869959", "vType": 0}}```
- **健康座舱**：0苯0醛环保材料+负氧离子发生器，空气质量媲美雨林。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 18, "data": {"num": [14, 29], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "丁丁科技说", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227427940796059", "index": 29, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "未来的学习笔记", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227416299770076", "index": 14, "label": ""}], "name": "丁丁科技说", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.960.960.50/005NO8hCly8h8l2xax9qmj30qo0qomxz.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761907028&ssig=UGLxsgeDqw", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227427940796059", "vType": 0}}```
- **性能表现**：零百加速3.95秒，综合续航最高1305km（增程版），15分钟快充补能50%。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 19, "data": {"num": [4, 18], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "好多车ANYCAR", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227387001766212", "index": 18, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "布朗倪Suki", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227386918667232", "index": 4, "label": ""}], "name": "好多车ANYCAR", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/67675761ly8h3q8ank416j20u00u0js7.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761907027&ssig=EqX3W57EaA", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227387001766212", "vType": 0}}```
代号腿妹
水雾同学_DrEV
高嘉龙Dragon

### **三、市场反响与行业意义**
1. **销量突破**
上市25天大定破2万台，首周销量超越奥迪A6L、奔驰E级等同级豪华车型。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 22, "data": {"num": [20, 26], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "我是慕森", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227420626191720", "index": 20, "label": ""}, {"name": "大圣说车", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227433704816831", "index": 26, "label": ""}]}}```

2. **品类重塑**
打破“旅行车=旅行专用”的刻板印象，以“多功能豪华旗舰”定位切入行政级市场，直接对标BBA。鸿蒙智行借势强化“科技+豪华”双标签。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 23, "data": {"num": [9, 11, 13, 26], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "高彦Will", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227386997833965", "index": 9, "label": ""}, {"name": "科技头条", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227426890124479", "index": 11, "label": ""}, {"name": "水雾同学_DrEV", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227426792869959", "index": 13, "label": ""}, {"name": "大圣说车", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227433704816831", "index": 26, "label": ""}], "name": "高彦Will", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/5ca39c7fly8hodvelzpxcj20u00u041h.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761907027&ssig=IYlIjVETOd", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227386997833965", "vType": 0}}```
高彦Will

### **四、用户互动与传播效果**
- **话题引爆**：微博话题#旅行车不旅行行不行#单日播放量超百万，网友自发填充“行不行”句式（如“去结婚行不行”）形成UGC传播。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 26, "data": {"num": [30, 32], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "幸运涛", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227387253424579", "index": 30, "label": ""}, {"name": "爱车的汤包", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227477992473356", "index": 32, "label": ""}], "name": "幸运涛", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/62f869c3ly8i5eurd34ukj20u00u0gnc.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761907028&ssig=szm8g9RWCl", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227387253424579", "vType": 0}}```
- **消费者反馈**：车主实测强调“地库自动泊车依赖症”及“带娃神器”实用性。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 27, "data": {"num": [28, 34], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "波波玩个车", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227395476884030", "index": 28, "label": ""}, {"name": "宋素雯", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227419779995192", "index": 34, "label": ""}], "name": "波波玩个车", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/a56c84afly8hmzvw2wgz8j20u00u00us.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761907028&ssig=catONT6QA8", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227395476884030", "vType": 0}}```
### **总结**
余承东此次官宣通过“顶流代言+产品场景化演绎”，成功将享界S9T塑造为“打破边界的生活搭子”。其市场表现验证了国产豪华车在智能化与场景创新上的颠覆力，也为旅行车品类开辟全新增长赛道。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 29, "data": {"num": [18, 26], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "好多车ANYCAR", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227387001766212", "index": 18, "label": ""}, {"name": "大圣说车", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227433704816831", "index": 26, "label": ""}]}}```
